mapper.select: SELECT ia.interest_area_id, ia.is_main, ia.user_id, b.baseaddress_id, b.sidoName, b.gugunName, b.dongName, b.dongCode, b.lat, b.lng, ca.dongName, ca.convenience_store, ca.education, ca.cafe, ca.restaurant, ca.health, ca.market, ca.avg_diff_convenience_store, ca.avg_diff_education, ca.avg_diff_cafe, ca.avg_diff_restaurant, ca.avg_diff_health, ca.avg_diff_market, l.label_id, l.name FROM user_interest_area_mapping ia, baseaddress b, dong_commercial_area ca LEFT OUTER JOIN label l ON (ca.label_id = l.label_id) WHERE ia.baseaddress_id = b.baseaddress_id AND b.dongCode = ca.dongCode AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_interest_area_mapping(user_id, baseaddress_id, is_main) VALUES(#{userId}, (SELECT baseaddress_id FROM baseaddress WHERE dongCode = #{dongCode}), 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE user_interest_area_mapping SET is_main = 0 WHERE is_main = 1
